title: DPS BestOf
itunes:title: DPS BestOf
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, the guys react to being nominated for an Emmy for the 5th straight year. Will this be the year they finally break through. Writer Wright Thompson checks in from Augusta and talks about what he expects from Tiger Woods. And Mike Piazza calls from Italy to talk the new pitch signally technology MLB implemented.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
